subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Fatalities)
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Derek Boogaard, an enforcer signed last season by the Rangers, was found dead in his Minnesota apartment. His family authorized Boston University researchers to examine his brain for damage.
snippet: Derek Boogaard, an enforcer signed last season by the Rangers, was found dead in his Minnesota apartment. His family authorized Boston University researchers to examine his brain for damage.
